languages.text: "Это моя работа — знать все. И я справляюсь с ней очень хорошо. Помните об этом, {name}".
"It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Это моя работа — знать все. И я справляюсь с ней очень хорошо. Помните об этом, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, {name}."
"It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, {name}."
"It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, {name}."
"It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, {name}."
"It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, {name}."

languages.text: 「万事を知るのが私の仕事だ。そして現に熟知している。覚えておけ、{name}」
languages.original_text: "It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「万事を知るのが私の仕事だ。そして現に熟知している。覚えておけ、{name}」

languages.original_text: "It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, ."

languages.text: “‘无所不知’，这就是我的职责所在，而我从不辜负我的职责。你最好记住这一点，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “‘无所不知’，这就是我的职责所在，而我从不辜负我的职责。你最好记住这一点，{name}。”

languages.text: «Mi trabajo es saberlo todo. Y se me da muy bien hacerlo. Téngalo en cuenta, {name}».
languages.original_text: "It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Mi trabajo es saberlo todo. Y se me da muy bien hacerlo. Téngalo en cuenta, {name}».

languages.text: « Mon travail consiste à tout savoir et je l'accomplis à la perfection. Tâchez de ne pas l'oublier, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Mon travail consiste à tout savoir et je l'accomplis à la perfection. Tâchez de ne pas l'oublier, {name}. »

languages.text: "Es gehört zu meinem Beruf, alles zu wissen. Und ich beherrsche meinen Beruf sehr gut. Vergesst das nie, {name}."
languages.original_text: "It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Es gehört zu meinem Beruf, alles zu wissen. Und ich beherrsche meinen Beruf sehr gut. Vergesst das nie, {name}."

languages.text: "Benim işim, her şeyi bilmek. İşimde de iyiyimdir. Bunu aklından çıkarma {name}."
languages.original_text: "It is my job to know everything. And I do it very well. Keep that in mind, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Benim işim her şeyi bilmek ve de işimde iyiyimdir. Bunu aklından çıkarma {name}."
